sentences.en: Motorbikes and trucks hurtle along the roads.
sentences.cn: 摩托车和卡车在村路上轰鸣而过。

sentences.en: A RACING track hums as miniature cars hurtle round it.
sentences.cn: 微缩的小车在跑道上飞驰，嗡嗡作响。

sentences.en: Mr Van der Meer wanted to get particles to hurtle into each other head on.
sentences.cn: 范德梅尔先生想通过粒子相互对撞来获捕粒子。
